medical_history.chief_complaint: Fever and abdominal pain after stem-cell transplantation.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began approximately 7 months before admission with low-grade fevers and fatigue, leading to an unintentional weight loss of 10 kg. Five months prior to admission, pain developed in the right arm and leg. The fevers and fatigue resolved before the transplantation, but fever and abdominal pain developed post-transplantation.
medical_history.past_medical_history: B-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia (ALL), low-back pain, history of intravenous opiate use.
medical_history.family_history: Mother and maternal grandmother had lung cancer; maternal aunt had breast cancer; father had multiple sclerosis.
medical_history.social_history: Smoked cigarettes for over 25 years (continuing), drank alcohol rarely, lived alone, disabled due to illness, Native American ancestry.
